SEARCH
Package HMS.src.ui

Class PickerUI

java.lang.Object
HMS.src.ui.PickerUI
public class PickerUI extends Object
The PickerUI class serves as the entry point for user authentication and role-based navigation. It manages user login credentials, verifies roles, and redirects users to their respective interfaces based on their role.

  • Method Details

    • loadAllUserDetails

      private List<String[]> loadAllUserDetails()
      Loads all user IDs from the password CSV into a set for quick lookup.
      Returns:
      A set of all user IDs.

    • getUserDomain

      private int getUserDomain()
      Prompts the user to select their domain (role) and returns the choice.
      Returns:
      An integer representing the user's role choice (1-4).

    • getUserID

      private String getUserID()
      Prompts the user to enter their ID.
      Returns:
      A string representing the user's ID in uppercase.

    • getUserPassword

      private String getUserPassword()
      Prompts the user to enter their password and hashes it.
      Returns:
      A hashed password string.

    • authenticateUser

      private boolean authenticateUser(String id, String password, String expectedRole)
      Authenticates the user by verifying their ID and hashed password against stored credentials.
      Parameters:
      id - The user's ID.
      password - The hashed password entered by the user.
      Returns:
      true if authentication is successful; false otherwise.

    • displayLoginOptions

      public void displayLoginOptions()
      Displays login options to the user, handles role selection, and initiates authentication. If authentication succeeds, redirects the user to their role-based interface.

    • getRoleFromDomain

      private String getRoleFromDomain(int domain)
      Returns the role corresponding to the domain selected by the user.
      Parameters:
      domain - The domain selected by the user.
      Returns:
      A string representing the user's role.

    • handleLogin

      private void handleLogin(int choice, String id)
      Redirects the user to their role-based interface after successful login.
      Parameters:
      choice - The role chosen by the user.
      id - The user's ID.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Entry point for the PickerUI.
      Parameters:
      args - Command-line arguments
